title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Game-Based Language Learning Design: Expert Panel Discussion Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and language education experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can derive a design framework linking game mechanics with language learning objectives
Learners can write a comparative report (over 3,000 characters) analyzing diverse expert perspectives through panel discussion analysis
Learners can develop and evaluate one game prototype applicable to real-world language education settings via PBL
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
